00030 static inline void _delayFourCycles(unsigned int __count)
00031 {
00032     if ( __count == 0 )    
00033         __asm__ __volatile__( "rjmp 1f\n 1:" );    // 2 cycles
00034     else
00035         __asm__ __volatile__ (
00036             "1: sbiw %0,1" "\n\t"                  
00037             "brne 1b"                              // 4 cycles/loop
00038             : "=w" (__count)
00039             : "0" (__count)
00040            );
00041 }
00042 
00043 
00048 #define delay(us)  _delayFourCycles( ( ( 1*(F_CPU/4000) )*us)/1000 )
00049
